overview.purpose: A concise explanation of the model's function.
overview.intended_domain: The specific field or sector the model is designed for.
overview.model_description: Extended summary of what the model is/does, including languages supported, model type, and licensing information.

compliance.risk_categorization: Classification of the AI system by risk (unacceptable, high, limited, minimal/none) with outlined measures for high-risk categories.
compliance.transparency_and_ethics: Strategies implemented to guarantee transparency in AI interactions and uphold ethical standards, including the identification of AI-generated content.
compliance.incident_reporting: A mechanism for reporting serious incidents, detailing incident tracking and reporting protocols.
compliance.model_registration: Confirmation of the model's registration in compliance with the EU AI Act.
compliance.data_governance_and_documentation: Documentation on data governance and adherence to documentation standards.
compliance.transparency_obligations: Actions taken to fulfill transparency obligations and prevent illegal content generation.
compliance.copyrighted_material_use: Documentation detailing the use of copyrighted material in training data.
compliance.eu_conformity: A copy of the EU declaration of conformity and any harmonised standards or technical specifications applied.

training_data.description: Comprehensive details on the dataset used for training, including its origin and volume.
training_data.preprocessing: Description of preprocessing steps taken to prepare the data.
training_data.governance: Data governance practices ensuring compliance with EU standards.

inputs_outputs.inputs: Specification of the model's input types and formats.
inputs_outputs.outputs: Specification of the model's output types and formats.

performance_metrics.metrics_used: Metrics applied to evaluate the model's performance.

bias.information: Details on any identified biases within the model and mitigation strategies.

robustness.details: Information on the model's resilience to attacks or failures, including test results.

domain_shift.information: How the model adapts to or is affected by changes in input data distribution.

test_data.description: Information on the dataset used for testing, including its origin and volume.
test_data.performance: Outcomes of testing the model on the test dataset.

conditions.optimal_conditions: Scenarios where the model performs optimally.
conditions.poor_conditions: Scenarios known to degrade the model's performance.

explanation.details: An overview of how the model processes inputs to generate outputs, including model architecture and objective.

environmental_impact.carbon_emitted: Estimated carbon emissions and additional considerations like electricity usage.
environmental_impact.compute_infrastructure: Details on hardware, software, and cloud provider used.

technical_specifications.model_architecture: Detailed description of the model architecture and objective.
technical_specifications.compute_resources: Description of computational resources used for development, training, testing, and validation.

contact_information: Who to contact for more information or in case of queries.
miscellaneous: Other information not categorised, including how to get started with the model, model card authors, and citation details.
